name: The Campfire
description:
Description

You're an elf who got lost in the forest.

It is too late to try to go back to the village, you will be forced to survive until the morning.

Keep the fire alive by chopping wood and use your torch to move around.

Watch out! Something awaits you in the dark .. # Commands

> WADS: Movements

> Left click: Action

> Mouse wheel: Select item

Chop the trees to keep your campfire alive.

Use it to **lit your torch**.

Survive the night!
